main event: A civilian observed a silver object traveling at a high rate of speed in Navarro, Minnesota on 22 August 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as being very fast and erratic in motion., The observer noted that it moved unlike any conventional aircraft., The sighting lasted approximately 5-6 seconds., There were no balloons released in the area at the time of the sighting., The observer emphasized that the object was perfectly round and the size of a golf ball.
witness description: A male machinist inspector, 28 years old.
